mmorpg.chat.dev_tools_enabled_contact_th: Devs tools enabled, if you see this please contact the author of Mine and Slash [robertx22], he forgot to disable them!
mmorpg.chat.enchant_upgrade_rarity: Enchants must be applied consecutively. A common enchant has to come before an uncommon enchant may be applied.
mmorpg.chat.favor_death_msg: Your Favor has fallen by %1$s Points.
mmorpg.chat.favor_down: ยงcAs a result of death, your Favor has fallen to %1$s. Remember this disgrace.
mmorpg.chat.favor_up: ยงaAs a result of your achievements, your Favor has risen to %1$s!
mmorpg.chat.item_non_nbt: This is an empty item, without any NBT/Random Stats, this means you got it through creative mode or a /give command. If you want to test the mod, you can use the /mine_and_slash give command which creates items with working NBT.
mmorpg.chat.need_pearl: You need to have at least one %1$s in your inventory to enter.
mmorpg.chat.needs_empty_or_rune: Requires an empty socket, or a rune inside the item. If the item has a rune, it will be re-rolled.
mmorpg.chat.new_day: A new day has arrived! Profession drop rates have been boosted for the following items:
mmorpg.chat.not_correct_tier_level: You are trying to use an in item with a different level range than possible.
mmorpg.chat.not_family: Can't be applied to an item of that slot family.
mmorpg.chat.not_gear: This is not a gear item.
mmorpg.chat.not_jewel: This is not a jewel item.
mmorpg.chat.not_owner: ยงcYou are not the owner of this Station.
mmorpg.chat.not_skillgem: This is not a skill gem.
mmorpg.chat.not_tool: This is not a tool item, or the tool has no stats yet.
mmorpg.chat.profession_level_up: Your %1$s level has increased to level %2$s!
mmorpg.chat.this_item_cant_be_used_more_: This item has already reached maximum uses: (%1$s)
mmorpg.chat.too_many_buffs: You can't have that many buffs.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.affix_tier_up_: Unpredictably Adds or removes a tier from a random affix.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.entangled_affi: Either Upgrades a random affix to maximum tier, or removes all affixes on an item.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.entangled_qual: Upgrades Quality of An Item, boosting gear potential
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.entangled_uniq: Upgrades unique stats by +10% or destroys the item.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.level_up_orb: Increases gear level, maximum 5 uses on an item.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.mastery_seal0: Caps the level of drops possible with a profession tool. Useful in case you want lower level drops, in case you still need materials to level up your crafting skills.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.mastery_seal1: Caps the level of drops possible with a profession tool. Useful in case you want lower level drops, in case you still need materials to level up your crafting skills.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.mastery_seal2: Caps the level of drops possible with a profession tool. Useful in case you want lower level drops, in case you still need materials to level up your crafting skills.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.mastery_seal3: Caps the level of drops possible with a profession tool. Useful in case you want lower level drops, in case you still need materials to level up your crafting skills.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.mastery_seal4: Caps the level of drops possible with a profession tool. Useful in case you want lower level drops, in case you still need materials to level up your crafting skills.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.mastery_seal5: Caps the level of drops possible with a profession tool. Useful in case you want lower level drops, in case you still need materials to level up your crafting skills.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.orb_of_linking: Re-rolls gem links, min is 1, max is 5 links.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.orb_of_quality: Upgrades Quality of An Item, quality boosts defenses.
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.sharpening_sto: Upgrades Quality of An Item by 2%, can only be used once
Upgrades Quality of An Item by 4%, can only be used once
Upgrades Quality of An Item by 6%, can only be used once
Upgrades Quality of An Item by 8%, can only be used once
Upgrades Quality of An Item by 10%, can only be used once
Upgrades Quality of An Item by 12%, can only be used once
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.socket_adder: Has a chance to add a socket or do nothing
item.mmorpg.currency.desc.unique_reroll: Increases or reduces unique stats by 5%
mmorpg.stat_desc.accuracy: Increases your chance to hit, low accuracy also causes crits to fail. Specifically it decreases opponent's chance to dodge
mmorpg.stat_desc.alchemy_core_drop_bonus: Prof drops are split into categories, this stat increases the droprate of one such
mmorpg.stat_desc.alchemy_double_drop: Chance for profession to double the drop, if it happens

mmorpg.stat_desc.alchemy_triple_drop: Chance for profession to triple the drop, if it happens
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_all_damage: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_chaos_damage: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_dot_damage: Fire damage over time increases damage of burn, for example.

mmorpg.stat_desc.area_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.area_dmg: Affects dmg done by area of effect abilities. Think meteor or other large aoe spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor: Decreases physical damage taken by a percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.arrow_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.attack_atk_style_dmg: Magic damage are mage spells, like fireball.
mmorpg.stat_desc.aura_effect: Increases stats your auras give you by %
mmorpg.stat_desc.axe_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.beast_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_chance: Chance to Cause the Ailment on hit. Maximum is 100%, Ailment strength is affected by the total damage dealt and all ailments accumulate, some may have caps.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_duration: Increases duration. For DOTs, this does increase the total damage dealt, but it doesn't increase damage per second.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_proc_chance: Procs the accumulated damage of the ailment
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_resistance: Protects against the ailment, if it's 100%, it acts as immunity.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_strength: Increases the effect, if it's a DOT, increases damage, if it's not, decreases the amount of damage needed to fully apply it.
mmorpg.stat_desc.block_chance: Chance to passively block damage, requires a shield in the offhand, but don't have to activate it.
mmorpg.stat_desc.blood: Blood is a unique resource that works like mana.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bonus_phys_to_ele: Grants % of physical attack damage as extra elemental damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.bow_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.burn_chance: Chance to Cause the Ailment on hit. Maximum is 100%, Ailment strength is affected by the total damage dealt and all ailments accumulate, some may have caps.
mmorpg.stat_desc.burn_duration: Increases duration. For DOTs, this does increase the total damage dealt, but it doesn't increase damage per second.
mmorpg.stat_desc.burn_proc_chance: Procs the accumulated damage of the ailment
mmorpg.stat_desc.burn_resistance: Protects against the ailment, if it's 100%, it acts as immunity.
mmorpg.stat_desc.burn_strength: Increases the effect, if it's a DOT, increases damage, if it's not, decreases the amount of damage needed to fully apply it.
mmorpg.stat_desc.cast_speed: Affects amount of time needed to cast spells. If the spell is instant, it reduces the cooldown
mmorpg.stat_desc.cd_ticks: Reduces spell cooldown by x ticks
mmorpg.stat_desc.chaining_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.

mmorpg.stat_desc.extra_mob_drops: Mobs with this stat drop extra loot when slain.

mmorpg.stat_desc.farming_triple_drop: Chance for profession to triple the drop, if it happens
mmorpg.stat_desc.fire_dot_damage: Fire damage over time increases damage of burn, for example.

mmorpg.stat_desc.freeze_chance: Chance to Cause the Ailment on hit. Maximum is 100%, Ailment strength is affected by the total damage dealt and all ailments accumulate, some may have caps.
mmorpg.stat_desc.freeze_duration: Increases duration. For DOTs, this does increase the total damage dealt, but it doesn't increase damage per second.
mmorpg.stat_desc.freeze_proc_chance: Procs the accumulated damage of the ailment
mmorpg.stat_desc.freeze_resistance: Protects against the ailment, if it's 100%, it acts as immunity.
mmorpg.stat_desc.freeze_strength: Increases the effect, if it's a DOT, increases damage, if it's not, decreases the amount of damage needed to fully apply it.
mmorpg.stat_desc.full_swing_damage: Bonus damage when attacking with full basic attack swings
mmorpg.stat_desc.gear_defense: Modifies the gear's base defense value, whether it's armor, magic shield or dodge.
mmorpg.stat_desc.golem_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.golem_spell_chance: Bonus Chance for golems to cast their AOE nova spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.heal_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.heal_effect_on_self: Increases spell related heals on you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_regen: Restores this much every few seconds.

mmorpg.stat_desc.inc_aoe: Spell aoe effects will be larger
mmorpg.stat_desc.inc_leech: Affects all resource leech stats like: onhit, leech dmg, on kill restore etc
mmorpg.stat_desc.increased_quantity: Increases amount of loot found in chests
mmorpg.stat_desc.int_dmg: Magic damage are mage spells, like fireball.

mmorpg.stat_desc.intelligence: Determines your total: Mana, Mana Regen, Magic Shield
mmorpg.stat_desc.jewel_socket: Allows you to socket more jewels
mmorpg.stat_desc.leech_per_sec: Your leech/resource on hits are capped to x% per second, this stat increases that.
mmorpg.stat_desc.lightning_dot_damage: Fire damage over time increases damage of burn, for example.
mmorpg.stat_desc.low_hp_healing: Boosts healing done to low hp/magic shield targets. If magic shield is higher, it checks that, otherwise it checks HP.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_find: Adds chance for higher rarity of items found.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield: Like health, but works differently and might need different ways to restore.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_heal: A % of your healing goes to your magic shield too.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_regen: Restores this much every few seconds.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana: Mana is used to cast spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_regen: Restores this much every few seconds.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_shield: Percent of damage is absorbed by mana. This effect only works if mana is not less than 50 percent capacity. Mana shield is applied after magic shield.
mmorpg.stat_desc.max_ele_resist: Adds element resist above the 75% cap (max 90%)
